description: These kaomojis are waving their arms as if to say, “forget it” or “Nope!”. Their hands are swiping at the air as if to erase the thing that they don’t like from their mind. They are not vibing well with the situation at all and they don’t want to hear any more about it. Nope, I’m done, forget it. (¬_¬)ﾉ (￣∠ ￣ )ﾉ (;-_-)ノ (^-^*)/ ＼(-_- ) ＼( ･_･) ＼(-o- ) ヾ(-_-;) Σ(;´□｀)ﾉ
title: Forget it!
